name: Blade of Following
description:
You play as a ninja in feudal Japan whose Shuriken (ninja stars) have been blessed by a goddess with the power to redirect themselves mid-flight!

You have been assigned by your master to infiltrate a powerful emperor’s fortress and assassinate him using only your magical shuriken and your wits! 

But beware; the emperor’s fortress is well guarded and riddled with traps, so it won’t be easy to get to him!
